Definition: For the given text, output "yes" if it contains any instances of Identity Directed Abuse, Affiliation Directed Abuse, Person Directed Abuse, or Counter Speech. We consider the content to be abusive if it contains any of the following: negative statements made against an identity, negativity expressed against an affiliation, negativity directed against an identifiable person, or content that challenges, condemns, or calls out abusive language. If the text does not contain any instances of abuse, output "no".
